message.content: {"id": "108822", "title": "More optimal logic is expected to process disk sorting when there is a border value for row value", "description": "When sorting on disk, if sorting on 40000 rows of data and the program is set to process only a subset of the data less than 40000, the current implementation performs certain operations which need improvement.", "OB": "The current implementation of disk sorting when handling a border value for the row value is suboptimal.", "EB": "The disk sorting algorithm should be optimized to handle border values for row values more efficiently.", "SR": "Improve the logic for disk sorting when there is a border value for the row value to optimize performance and reduce unnecessary operations."}
